snp4.14:915: "Pucchāmi taṁ ādiccabandhu,Vivekaṁ santipadañca mahesi;Kathaṁ disvā nibbāti bhikkhu,Anupādiyāno lokasmiṁ kiñci".
snp4.14:916: "Mūlaṁ papañcasaṅkhāya,Mantā asmīti sabbamuparundhe;Yā kāci taṇhā ajjhattaṁ,Tāsaṁ vinayā sadā sato sikkhe.
snp4.14:917: Yaṁ kiñci dhammamabhijaññā,Ajjhattaṁ atha vāpi bahiddhā;Na tena thāmaṁ kubbetha,Na hi sā nibbuti sataṁ vuttā.
snp4.14:918: Seyyo na tena maññeyya,Nīceyyo atha vāpi sarikkho;Phuṭṭho anekarūpehi,Nātumānaṁ vikappayaṁ tiṭṭhe.
snp4.14:919: Ajjhattamevupasame,Na aññato bhikkhu santimeseyya;Ajjhattaṁ upasantassa,Natthi attā kuto nirattā vā.
snp4.14:920: Majjhe yathā samuddassa,Ūmi no jāyatī ṭhito hoti;Evaṁ ṭhito anejassa,Ussadaṁ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñci".
snp4.14:921: "Akittayī vivaṭacakkhu,Sakkhidhammaṁ parissayavinayaṁ;Paṭipadaṁ vadehi bhaddante,Pāṭimokkhaṁ atha vāpi samādhiṁ".
snp4.14:922: "Cakkhūhi neva lolassa,Gāmakathāya āvaraye sotaṁ;Rase ca nānugijjheyya,Na ca mamāyetha kiñci lokasmiṁ.
snp4.14:923: Phassena yadā phuṭṭhassa,Paridevaṁ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñci;Bhavañca nābhijappeyya,Bheravesu ca na sampavedheyya.
snp4.14:924: Annānamatho pānānaṁ,Khādanīyānaṁ athopi vatthānaṁ;Laddhā na sannidhiṁ kayirā,Na ca parittase tāni alabhamāno.
snp4.14:925: Jhāyī na pādalolassa,Virame kukkuccā nappamajjeyya;Athāsanesu sayanesu,Appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyya.
snp4.14:926: Niddaṁ na bahulīkareyya,Jāgariyaṁ bhajeyya ātāpī;Tandiṁ māyaṁ hassaṁ khiḍḍaṁ,Methunaṁ vippajahe savibhūsaṁ.
snp4.14:927: Āthabbaṇaṁ supinaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ,No vidahe athopi nakkhattaṁ;Virutañca gabbhakaraṇaṁ,Tikicchaṁ māmako na seveyya.
snp4.14:928: Nindāya nappavedheyya,Na uṇṇameyya pasaṁsito bhikkhu;Lobhaṁ saha macchariyena,Kodhaṁ pesuṇiyañca panudeyya.
snp4.14:929: Kayavikkaye na tiṭṭheyya,Upavādaṁ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñci;Gāme ca nābhisajjeyya,Lābhakamyā janaṁ na lapayeyya.
snp4.14:930: Na ca katthitā siyā bhikkhu,Na ca vācaṁ payuttaṁ bhāseyya;Pāgabbhiyaṁ na sikkheyya,Kathaṁ viggāhikaṁ na kathayeyya.
snp4.14:931: Mosavajje na nīyetha,Sampajāno saṭhāni na kayirā;Atha jīvitena paññāya,Sīlabbatena nāññamatimaññe.
snp4.14:932: Sutvā rusito bahuṁ vācaṁ,Samaṇānaṁ vā puthujanānaṁ;Pharusena ne na paṭivajjā,Na hi santo paṭisenikaronti.
snp4.14:933: Etañca dhammamaññāya,Vicinaṁ bhikkhu sadā sato sikkhe;Santīti nibbutiṁ ñatvā,Sāsane gotamassa na pamajjeyya.
snp4.14:934: Abhibhū hi so anabhibhūto,Sakkhidhammamanītihamadassī;Tasmā hi tassa bhagavato sāsane,Appamatto sadā namassamanusikkhe"ti.
